00197 
00198         enum OperState {
00199             SInitial,   // No request being processed
00200             SRequest,   // Request has been sent, waiting for response
00201             SResponse,  // Response has been received, waiting for application
00202             SFinal      // Final response received, waiting for completion
00203         };
